Love_Honey_Get_500_Gold_for_every_friend.message: Love Honey? Get $$5 worth of Gold for every friend you refer, and redeem your Gold points for gift cards at some of the most popular stores. Just copy and share the link below to get started!

Once_you_earn_1000_Honey_Gold_you_can_re.message: Once you earn 1,000 Honey Gold, you can redeem it for a $$10 gift card from stores like Amazon, Target and Walmart.

When_you_shop_at_any_of_our_5500_partici.message: When you shop at any of our 5,500+ participating sites, you’ll earn a percentage back in Honey Gold. Redeem 1,000 Gold for a $$10 gift card from some of your favorite stores.
